a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Expressed in tonnes of meat. Data from 1961-2013 is based on published FAO estimates; from 2013-2050
based on FAO projections. Projections are based on future population projections and the expected impacts of
regional and national economic growth trends on meat consumption.
Data source: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
